section.title: Keyman Configuration
section.para: Keyman Configuration is the central control panel for Keyman. Use Keyman Configuration to purchase and activate Keyman, switch the language of Keyman menus, install and uninstall keyboards, change options, set hotkeys, disable addins, associate languages, check for updates and run support diagnostics.

listitem.para: Click on the Keyman icon , on the Windows Taskbar near the clock.
From the Keyman menu, select Configuration….
